pullRequest.title: refactored tests to remove dupe
pullRequest.bodyText:
Signed-off-by: Sally MacFarlane sally.macfarlane@consensys.net
Moved duplicated code into BeforeEach method

commit.message:
refactored tests to remove dupe

Signed-off-by: Sally MacFarlane <sally.macfarlane@consensys.net>

nodes.bodyText: This will share the client and event bus between tests which seems like a bad idea.
Mocks are not safe to reuse across tests so these should not be static.
I suspect you want @BeforeEach so the each test remains independent.

commit.message:
remove blank line

Signed-off-by: Sally MacFarlane <sally.macfarlane@consensys.net>
